articles.description: ​The company had revenue from operations of Rs 5,031.75 crore in the April-June quarter a year ago, Avenue Supermarts informed BSE in a regulatory filing. In the April-June quarter of FY 2020-21, Avenue Supermarts' standalone revenue was at Rs 3,833.23 crore.…
articles.content: Ltd, which owns and operates retail chain D-Mart, on Saturday reported a nearly twofold rise in its standalone revenue from operations to Rs 9,806.89 crore for the first quarter ended on June 30, 202… [+973 chars]

articles.title: Canara Bank crosses Rs 1 trn mark for outstanding gold loan book in June - Business Standard
articles.description: Canara Bank is pushing this business in Eastern region and two metropolitan areas  Mumbai and Pune
articles.content: After the State Bank of India, now another large public sector Canara Bank has crossed Rs one trillion mark for outstanding gold loan book in June 2022. The Bengaluru-based lender is looking to expan… [+1823 chars]
